thread.title: Walk-in customers to be able to get iPhone 6s and 6s Plus this Friday
thread.title_full: Walk-in customers to be able to get iPhone 6s and 6s Plus this Friday

title: Walk-in customers to be able to get iPhone 6s and 6s Plus this Friday
text:
Walk-in customers to be able to get iPhone 6s and 6s Plus this Friday Published: 22 September 2015 4:41 PM 
The two newest iPhones will be available in most Apple Stores from this Friday, September 25. Apple confirmed on Monday that its newest iPhone models, the 6s and 6s Plus, will be available to walk-in customers from 8 am (local time) in most Apple retail stores, AT&T, Sprint, T-Mobile, Verizon Wireless, additional carriers and The two newest iPhones will be available in most Apple Stores from this Friday, September 25. 
Apple confirmed on Monday that its newest iPhone models, the 6s and 6s Plus, will be available to walk-in customers from 8 am (local time) in most Apple retail stores, AT&T, Sprint, T-Mobile, Verizon Wireless, additional carriers and "select Apple Authorized Resellers." 
The brand emphasized that walk-in customers should arrive early to avoid being disappointed. 
In China, Japan and Hong Kong, (as well as tax-free states) however, the new iPhones remain reservation-only. 
In the same announcement, Apple noted that its new iOS, iOS 9, is being adopted faster than any previous one, with 50% of devices already using it since its launch on September 16. â€“ AFP Relaxnews, September 22,
